
# Phil Hills: Systems Architect

## Identity Root
- **Canonical-Identity**: /identity.cube

## Technical Specializations
- **Q-Protocol (A2AC)**: Author of the bit-aligned AI communication standard.
- **Agentic Empire**: Architect of the 14-agent autonomous defense mesh.
- **Data Architecture**: High-density coordinate mapping for swarm robotics.
